name: Affil.ai
long_description:
We're an AI affiliate network for financial brands. 

Affiliate marketing is an important growth channel for financial brands like Capital One or Acorns, but growth is limited because it's difficult to ensure their affiliates are compliant with brand guidelines or regulations. 

We help financial companies monitor their affiliate marketing content so that they have full visibility into what their affiliates are saying, enabling them to expand marketing efforts & grow their revenue. Likewise, we work closely with affiliates to improve their experience as well. 

The incumbents in the space makes billions providing a subpar experience for everyone. We're here to revolutionize affiliate marketing for the financial space.
one_liner: AI Affiliate Network For Financial Brands
